amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to pay the salary of any officer or employee to carry out section 301 of the Hoover Power Plant Act of 1984 (Western Area Power Administration loan program).
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 9 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds to pay the salary of any officer or employee to carry out section 301 of the Hoover Power Plant Act of 1984 (WAPA borrowing program).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fleming amendment (A067) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A067) offered by Mr. Fleming.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fleming amendment (A067) Agreed to by voice vote.
